title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-2.5 - Waiver agreements related to medical benefits or treatment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-2.5 - Waiver agreements related to medical benefits or treatment

State Regulations

No waiver agreements with respect to an injured employee'
s medical benefits or treatment beyond the properly executed prescribed consent
form shall be valid and enforceable unless reviewed and approved by the board
in accordance with section
32
of
the Workers' Compensation Law and section
300.36
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
325-2.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
